item.title: 理解https(ssl/tls)加密原理
item.description: 概述 An HTTPS connection involves two parties: the client (the one who is initiating the connection, usually your web browser), and the server. These two parties are the ones that ‘shake hands.’ The purpose of the SSL/TLS handshake is to perform all the cryptographic work needed to have a secure connection.
